doc.previous: The Education group delivers educational products and solutions for primary secondary and international schools and Education Ministries worldwide
doc.after: Owing to the changes taking place in the way that books and content are bought and accessed Cambridge believes that digital products services and solutions could account for two thirds of its sales by 2020 12
